name: Add new Adalo records to Google Sheets as rows
description: Streamline your app's data management by automatically adding new records from Adalo to Google Sheets. With this template, every time a new record is created in your Adalo application, Make will seamlessly transfer that information into a designated row in Google Sheets. This integration not only enhances your data organization but also allows for easy analysis and reporting, ensuring you never miss a crucial update. Perfect for users looking to maintain a comprehensive database of their app's records.
